scripts.comment-01: In the postbuild script, we replace all occurrences of the
scripts.comment-02: absolute path `/_astro/..` with a relative path leading up
scripts.comment-03: to the same file. We do this so that this project can be
scripts.comment-04: served from a subdirectory, as well. For example, running
scripts.comment-05: a webserver in any of the paths leading up to the docs
scripts.comment-06: directory, and visiting the docs directory will serve the
scripts.comment-09: app at the URL http://127.0.0.1/x/docs/ and all the links
scripts.comment-10: in the resulting app will work as expected. The
scripts.comment-11: find_exactdepth command is defined by .envrc, and stored in
scripts.postbuild: touch ./docs/.nojekyll; for ((depth = 0; depth < 7; ++depth)) ; do dotslashes=''; level=$((depth-1 < 0 ? 0 : depth-1)); dotslashes=$(printf %*s $level | sed 's^ ^../^g'); find_exactdepth $depth ./docs/ -type f -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 --no-run-if-empty sed 's^/_astro/^'$dotslashes'_astro/^g' -i ; done
